channel.title: Music on Wings Music
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Wings Music

item.title: Walk Through The Forest
item.description: EP I See Birds Flying (Electronica) Walk Through The Forest (Melodic Dubstep) Netease QQ Spotify

item.title: Escape From The Earth
item.description: Single Lyrics: I become immortal Wandering from the earth on the morrow Dried tears without any sorrow If there is light I’ll just follow All is meaningless If consciousness can live without substance I’ll never know who I am Never know where’s the end I am dust in the universe Can’t escape from the curse Homeless, drown in loneliness I am dust in the universe Can’t escape from the curse

item.title: The End Of The World
item.description: EP Catastrophe The end of the world This is war Break free Memory flow Lyrics: The end of the world The sky is crashing down falling into the boundless ground too hard to sing a song tears in my eyes rolling down The fire is burning bright Stirring up the silent night There’s nowhere I can find you But your voice echoes in my mind I walk among the hopeless
